summary: In 33 AD, a Roman Tribune in Judea is tasked to find the missing body of Jesus Christ, who rose from the dead.
cast: Joseph Fiennes|Tom Felton|Peter Firth|Cliff Curtis|María Botto|Luis Callejo|Antonio Gil|Richard Atwill|Stewart Scudamore|Andy Gathergood|Stephen Hagan|Mish Boyko|Jan Cornet|Joe Manjón|Pepe Lorente|Stavros Demetraki|Selva Rasalingam|Manu Fullola|Mario Tardón|Stephen Greif|Àlex Maruny|Paco Manzanedo|Tomás Pozzi|Karim Saleh|Jacob Yakob|John Mula|Yuric Allison|Victor Trapani|Frida Cauchi|Mario de la Rosa|Cuco Usín|Mark Killeen|Ramiro Alonso|James Shilaimon|Kenneth Spiteri|Claudio Carta|Clare Agius|Graham Charles|Kevin Naudi|Margaret Jackman|Beppe Abela|Manolo Caro|Alberto Ayala|Darien Asian|Nate Bobbett|Malcolm Ellul|Adrián López|Mario Opinato|Jovan Pisani
title: Resucitado
